page.title: 09Caretaker/Fireman
page.content: {Mr Ian Graham}has been the janitor at{ {Gretna Primary School}and{Gretna {Community Centre}since{1979}.Since he lives and works locally{Mr Graham}is also a part-time member of the Gretna Fire Brigade. When asked about his job {Mr Graham}said that the new Primary School was easier to keep clean than the old school it replaced.Apart from general cleaning,his job at the Community Centre involved getting the main hall ready for events like sales of work and concerts. {Mr Graham}is also one of the ten part-time firemen based at Gretna. The region served by the Gretna station includes Rigg,Springfield,Kirkpatrick Fleming and into Cumbria if required.
